website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price point for a 55-inch television that also delivers the latest color technology in HDR10.
pros: With 4K Ultra HD resolution, you’ll be ready for newer programming technologies well into the future
Uses local dimming technology, so you can view the deepest blacks
Meshes nicely with multiple Apple streaming product options
cons: Some problems with build quality reported
Smart TV interface is not the easiest to use

customer_reviews.title: Good luck!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv cause I had a lot of friends tell me how long it lasted them. It has a feature called SmartCast which I didn’t even know it had when I bought it. Well SmartCast would never start up so my tv was stuck on a screen that read “please wait, SmartCast loading”. It would stay like that for hours. You could change inputs and start watching tv but but every time I turned on the tv it would show this screen. Researched it and found it’s a reoccurring problem with various vizio TVs. So I returned it and bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Daren C Kleiber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent high quality tv
customer_reviews.text: This tv delivered yesterday. After unpacking it took about 5 minutes to set it up. Downloaded quickly. Beautiful sharp clear picture. Half the cost of samsung I recently returned as it was broken upon trying to setup. Sound no picture. Samsung said sorry return it. If you purchase you will be amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJeff

customer_reviews.title: The TV from hell.
customer_reviews.text: The Vizio has a beautiful picture but the tv turned itself on independently several times per day. Vizio got a repair man to install a new board, but the tv continued to turn itself on independently. Then Vizio sent me a replacement. So far so good,right. But the replacement unit was defective in a new way - the audio failed repeatedly even after Vizio tech support. I’m returning it; Amazon was very helpful as usual. But it has been a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: David Hirshberg

customer_reviews.title: Terrible experience / disappointing quality
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in this product. I expected qled to have better colors and sharper pictures. Maybe I was wrong but the picture is terrible. Washed out images and not clear at all. My unit also randomly turns on by itself and I have no hdmi connections to the device and have turned cec off. This week the main start up page which was always terribly slow to load stopped loading. So now I only use this for netflix or Amazon video via direct buttons on the remote. I haven’t had a chance to call support as I don’t want to deal with the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Kidd

customer_reviews.title: WON'T WORK w HBO
customer_reviews.text: Not really a Smart TV, Very Disappointed in this Viizio, extremely difficult to use App system, it freezes constantly. So much so that it makes watching a program impossible. Also - You can't stream HBO from the TV, you have to use the app on your phone and sync - HOWEVER it keeps losing the stream. The picture is OK but not great. Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: George Willard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV, great price
customer_reviews.text: A very, very good TV for a great price. When my previous TV finally went I thought I would be investing at least $2,000 to get a comparable model. But this Vizio was highly rated and has delivered. It was easy to unpack and set up. As a self proclaimed TV snob, i am very happy with this purchase.I'd give it 4.5 stars if I could. There is a twinge of white noticeable from side viewing angles but when you are seated directly in front, the picture is excellent, bright and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: The Kick Is Good

customer_reviews.title: Strong color after adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Have been enjoying M558 g1 for a month. Likes: true 10 bit display, HLG support, quantum dots, FALD, 600 nits. Complaints: UI and remote ok but not great, a big miss is no rolling guide for OTA TV--only one channel at a time and only for present time. Overall the color is great, I found all of preset picture settings to be dull and dim except for vivid mode, so make your custom viewing mode by starting with vivid and color temp in cool for brighter whites and active array on High, then just experiment and tweak and you will have a great display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to update it offline to get Airplay to work
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, one of the reasons I purchased this model was the fact it came with Apple airplay, well sort of but not really. It will eventually get the update but its not available over the air right now. After a couple of calls to Amazon support and Vizio support they couldnt help us and told us we could send the TV back and purchase another model that has the upgrade available. We found an downloadable update on the Vizio website copied to a USB and updated the TV ourselves. a big hassle that wasnt needed because the specs on the listing were incorrect. the listing says Airplay 2 included not included later but we dont know when.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: All the good things are true.
customer_reviews.text: No need in nattering on about all the things you've read 20 times already. In 2007 I went from a 27 inch RCA flat CRT to a 47 inch Toshiba flat screen and the planets realigned, neighbors would come in to see this monster. It was a game changer. I won't say the M558-G1 has that same impact but it is leaps and bounds more enjoyable than than old HD 1080P edge lit tech of the past. Seriously people, don't try to squeeze a couple more years out of old tech, get the 4k HDR now! Have to run, 11 hours of football ahead today! Someone bring me a sammich and a beer!
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding television. So glad I purchased the M-series rather than opting for a less-expensive model. After five weeks of viewing my only gripe is a small one: When you are changing modes from watching Netflix, Amazon, or Hulu, you cannot simply hit "exit" on the remote to go back to cable. You have to change the input which requires a two-step process that includes scrolling to the side. A mild annoyance I would encourage Vizio to remedy in future generations of this TV.
customer_reviews.author: TennRev

customer_reviews.title: TV WILL NOT STAY TURNED OFF!
customer_reviews.text: I set it up, turned it off, and about an hour later it turned itself off and will not stop turning itself back on. It does not turn off even after I tried “auto timer” when it doesn’t receive any commands after 10 minutes. It’s draining my energy bill
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Lag and can’t support 1+ enabled UHD devices
customer_reviews.text: I connected my laptop (4k) and enabled UHD for HDMI, it works great, picture quality is awesome, then i bought apple 4k TV and connect it, it works when plugged in but when i went to enable UHD, TV frozen and reboot, i was in that loop forever until i turned off TV and unplugged my laptop (remove one uhd enabled device out). Everytime i start my apple tv, tv will reboot multiple times until i turn off TV, wait a bit then start again, then it will work. Great TV for picture quality, price and free tv channel but too many issues. Returning TV to get Something else insteas
customer_reviews.author: Hai Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: very good pictures and deep colors, MAKE SURE TO BUY THE CORRET MODEL NUMBER ENDS WITH 8 G1
customer_reviews.author: RockNation

customer_reviews.title: I exchanged my Vizio for the TCL 6 series. tCL has much better picture and audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tv because of the reviews and I have had 3 Vizios in the past. I was very disappointed with this Vizio model. I sent it back and bought the TCL 6 series instead. Good choice. The picture quality of the Vizio was terrible compared to the TCL. Making adjustments only helped a little. Still, no comparison. Also the audio quality was terrible compared to the TCL.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Murray

customer_reviews.title: VIZIO M Series Quantom M558-G1
customer_reviews.text: Check the Model Number for the M series. QUANTOM there's Many Models under M series. This is for M558-G1 It has Many Features Listed Already in the Description. Does Support All Known HDR content (HDR10,HDR10+,Dolby Vision,HLG etc ..) Great TV so Far. Was Hesitant but needed a replacement for my TCL C807 that broke. This TV is So Much Better. Great Picture. At first it was a Pain to set up. But Vizio Customer Service walked me through to Set up process. To get the best Experience possible. Download Vizio Smartcast App. It does help believe it or Not. Cant wait to play my PS4 on this Amazing 4K TV
customer_reviews.author: BuffyBuff

customer_reviews.title: Colors that will make your jaw drop
customer_reviews.text: Colors are really incredible, I'm blown away watching 4k hdr videos on YouTube. The remote works well, and it's intuitive. Blacks have a small bit of halos around bright objects but are REALLY DEEP. The value proposition of this tv is fantastic for what you get and I've been researching for a month. For $500, you get a 55" quantum dot tv with 10 bit color, 90ish dimming zones and a decent interface. Brightness is average with moderate glare in bright rooms. Great tv, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: vizio is finally a contender
customer_reviews.text: Really a quality television. I'm mainly using it for a pc monitor (2 actually) . Very clear text and picture. For pc it's best used at 1080p 60hz. At 4k there is a noticeable studder of mouse movement because it can only do 30hz. Other than that it's really good. Better than the current Samsung q series
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Simply a bad one
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Vizio. Have bought 7 prior and they were all great and then "this". Even on a "vivid" picture it looks glaringly horrible but the other settings are like "Blair Witch". First clue was TNF between the Cowboys and Bears and I thought maybe a fog rolled in. Not the case. Next night we watched a couple of movies and my wife said "maybe it's a dark film". Bottom line: Like it fell off the truck. Now? I don't know what to do. I think I may have to go to Costco and pay extra and haul the damn thing home. All the reviews were great and then we hooked it up.
customer_reviews.author: David Kane

customer_reviews.title: Good TV Vizio's last if you take care of it
customer_reviews.text: Great TV I love it only thing I will say it's not truly a native 120 hertz panel and I wish companies would just be more honest about that then kind of trick us with fancy words still I'm keeping it PS5 coming out Xbox x is coming out they require a hundred and twenty frames per second TVs I hope to see more true 120s
customer_reviews.author: IFNLOV

customer_reviews.title: Has bad motion and terrible back-light flickering.
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. Has terrible flickering that gives my eye fatigue and headache with prolonged usage. Also the has UI "HDMI input change" message bug with my Denon AVR that wont go away when you turn on the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Froilan

customer_reviews.title: Randomly turns on and off
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usual write reviews. Delivery was on time. Was boxed and handled great. Good quality for the money. I saw the review a couple times but I am now having the same problem. The tv shuts on and off on its own randomly. Come home from work and it’s on. Also cannot access HBO go on it unless it’s through my phone?
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, horrible software. Freezes up all the time.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is like a beautiful gorgeous woman that oozes sex appeal but routinely keeps you in the friend zone. I want to love this TV but the software freezes up so often that it’s barely usable. The built in chrome cast and Apple airplay save the ability to use it but Vizio crapped the bed when they designed the interface. I have strong WiFi connection but the moment the TV tries to stream anything in 4K from the built in apps it will lock up. Followed Vizio guidance and did a factory reset, made the issue worse. Such a pretty TV but has more issues than that hairdresser you dated in your 20s.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture
customer_reviews.text: This 55” Vizio replaced my 42” which was moved to a bedroom. It is great! Beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.author: Patti

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV!
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality and black level on this TV is fantastic! VIZIO really dialed it up on this M series. Have neighbors who bought this after seeing mine. Of course the built in speakers on this aren't outstanding, they're good, but most people will have it hooked to a sound bar or surround system anyway. The only adjustment I did was switched to 'standard' mode from 'vivid'. Vivid was way too much for me, and made people look like oranges. For the price compared to other manufacturers you can't go wrong, just make sure you get the M558 series not the M557. M558 has 90 dimming zones and it does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Scholze

customer_reviews.title: "Smart TV"
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to power on. Froze up on me twice already (had it 1 week), and had to unplug to fix. It lost all of my settings. Only good thing about this is the Chromecast. Wish I just bought a regular 4K TV and connected my own Chromecast. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and has a great picture. Setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, amazing picture, fast UI
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tv. the 4k HDR looks amazing when using a ps4 pro, and games play just fine. I have seen some reviews say games don't play well, but its been great to me and no problems. The UI is fast and offers a lot of features, with Chromecast built in and airplay 2 on the way, not sure what else you would want from a smart TV. For this price point, its a great bang for your buck. Vizio is still making great TVs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best tv overall, but at this price range I think it is the best. I have an Android TV so I don't know how well the built in software works. Tv is bright, I don't have glare anymore on the screen. I bought a 4k Samsung that was smaller, for this price and returned it. This tv destroys Samsung easily.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Speaker location
customer_reviews.text: good price for quality picture. The only problem we have is the speakers are locatedon the back of the tv on each corner side. So we had to buy a surround bar to have a speaker up front. Because it was never loud enough. Then it would be too loud in the otherroom as speakers faced the kitchen. Things you dont really think about. Our last vizio had the speakers on the bottom of the tv so it wasnt a problem. So any brand you buy i recommend knowing speaker location especially , mounted or not it matters.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Big quality for little $
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little bit of a tech snob. While obviously this isn't a $$$ oled 8k TV, it has a fantastic picture with very good color representation and deep blacks. The hdr is good enough to improve viewing and the control is snappy and responsive. It powers on and starts streaming < 20 seconds with smart casting.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew p.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PICTURE, RELIABLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE VISIO. We have four other Vizio TV's and didn't hesitate to add this one. This is our main TV in the Great Room. The picture quality is great. We added a VISIO Sound Bar which makes the sound even better. We always recommend VISIO to our friends when we find out they are researching TV's to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H. Osterman

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I expected for all the hype
customer_reviews.text: This screen is no better than vizio’s other 4K TVs. I was expecting something grander after hearing all the hype, but I assume those people either received a kick back for a licorice review or they haven’t seen a 4K tv. I actually prefer the picture on our other zivio tv that is 5 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Black Friday Happy
customer_reviews.text: I was debating very hard on what TV to finally get myself for Black Friday and I couldn’t have been happier. What sold me was the AirPlay feature. I have so much shows and movies on iTunes I wanted to be able to watch them on my TV with no problem and this TV does just that. Picture wise this TV is beautiful. Games like Resident Evil 2 take full advantage of the HDR mode this TV has and makes games look even better if you have the PS4. Interface is easy to navigate as well. I love this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns purchasing such a big TV online, I was particularly concerned about the care in shipping. But it turned out to be a good decision. Although I wasn't 100% satisfied at the way the UPS guy handled it while delivering it to my garage (I can't completely blame him, he was dealing with a heavy package), the TV, after unpacking, did not seem to have any damage. Now coming to the TV, I'm amazed by the picture quality that you get out of this considering its price! Native sound is pretty good too. I hope it reliably serves me for some time. So far I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Visio for Visio replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Screen is evenly illuminated and has good resolution but it depends on signal source (Cox Cable). It has many network sources paid and free. It has a lots of submenus so it takes a while to familiarize yourself with them. A real plus is it lights up almost instantly and works with IOS for power off-on. I may have paid more than I needed to but I wanted to replace an older 32” Visio with the same brand. I’m 90% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Mccurdy

customer_reviews.title: Very slow and randomly turns off
customer_reviews.text: While the picture quality and black values are great, I am pretty disappointed with this TV. I have several Vizio TV's from several years ago, but this one does not work very well. When changing inputs, the TV is very slow and often goes to a blank screen. This happens with my Bluray player and is excruciatingly slow with the Apple TV, which often takes over 30 seconds to switch. Furthermore, the TV randomly turns off, not only when switching inputs, but when content is paused for just a minute or two. The power saving feature was disabled and the problem still occurs randomly.
customer_reviews.author: Linden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: The VIZIO M series quantum is an excellent value. It doesn’t have the top of the line features or the fastest refresh rate, but it does everything good enough for most folks, including me. In my living room - mounted above the fireplace - you’d be hard pressed to distinguish it from higher end models. It does well with sports, movies, and, well, mostly kids cartoons. If you’re wavering, wait for a sale and pick this tv up. You’ll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: At the TV for two weeks very happy with it great picture quality the one thing that concerned me a little bit and come with a book of instructions about how to set up your menu and everything the only instructions that came with were how to plug it in and how to hanging on the wall so you kind of have to go through and use the Trial an error system but other than that I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly light weight compared to prior seven year-old Panasonic. Excellent picture and good audio. Only quibble is remote control. Unit is small and I have big hands, easy to hit streaming channel keys when turning on/off. Remote is also flimsy - fell off foot stool (20" high) to hard wood floor and popped open. Didn't break but now secure with tape -deducted one star.
customer_reviews.author: J. Little

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased with picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second VIZIO HDTV in seven years. I’m very pleased with picture quality and ease of operation. Also purchased a VIZIO matched sound bar and the experience is like being in a movie theater. Would highly recommend this 55” TV to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rich Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and depth. It can have black patching problems during dark scenes. But not all of the time. Could be older movie video problems. Speakers are tinny and of poor quality. It needs a sound system to be cool. It has buttons on the back so a lost controller isn't a game stopper. I've been using it for about ten months. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Tomiello

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: IT took a little poking around to work out how everything worked, but that's not surprising since I was moving up from an almost 8 year old smaller Vizio. I'm a little disjointed in the audio output of the buit in speakers, though that is likely more that I was expecting more than I should have been. Plus, since I use a 5.1 sound system anyway, it's not an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Frank C.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of C RAP
customer_reviews.text: Ethernet sucks. Can’t watch 4K streaming. We have 175Mbps download on our other devices and the TV bounces around between less than 1Mbps and 3Mbps. Switched to wired and max the TV can do is 15Mbps. It’s pathetic given our 175Mbps download speed (WiFi as tested). DON’T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: 605x3j14

customer_reviews.title: Picture great-sound not so great
customer_reviews.text: Main reason for buying was picture quality and number of dimming zones. The picture has very vivid colors so very happy about that. The biggest problem is the sound quality. The speakers are on the bottom of the TV and they point down. You have to turn the sound up very high just to be able to understand what is being said. Some people noted that they just added a sound bar and no big deal. My take on that is that I shouldn't have to add a sound bar to get good sound on a tv that costs a little under $500. Sound bar with optical cable sounds great but shouldn't be necessary.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Setup may be difficult or need serviceman’s help. Remote is junk !!
customer_reviews.text: Not working properly out of the box. Hour and half on phone with Vizio customer service still unable to prompt TV to connect to internet. Waiting for 5-7 working day’s to hear from unknown repair man to call. Only then will schedule a visit. Worst setup of a television I’ve ever had period. Also remote is garbage compared to every other Vizio tv I’ve ever owned (5).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen  DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Where value meets quality
customer_reviews.text: Would like to revise my review. TV turns itself on whenever it feels like, which is every day when I'm not home. Didn't sign up for a TV that I have to physically unplug the power cord to ensure it won't decide it's time to be on. Followed the troubleshooting guide and disabled CEC but this is a TV that just wants to be on and ready to go before you're ready for it. Definitely Vizio has some ambitions with this one, and so will you're electric bill
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Drops internet connection. Slow load times. Turns on by itself
customer_reviews.text: This is horrible. The vizio app is slow to load and constantly drops internet connection. It is not our connection because when I switch to Roku there are no issues with lost connection or load time. The only reason we are not returning this because the Roku has no problems and the picture quality on the tv is decent. Update: TV turns on by itself. That was the last straw. It is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: M. Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed, surprised in a bad way
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about this one. It got all of these great reviews and all I get is a laggy TV. Forget about Airplay, that’s laggy and I connected my MacBook Pro and that’s laggy. When I’m watching cable it’s fine. It’s not my connection and the TV is getting over 40mb/s to the TV. Trying different settings but over all I have to say I’m not too impressed.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Campana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price price point for what you get and amazing picture quality as well.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for amazing picture quality. WiFi works well for connectivity too and I’ve not lost a connection once. Viewing angles are fine too (I don’t try to watch it at 45 degree angles though). Vibrant colors and Pixar movies look amazing (my kids, I promise). NatGeo HD series on TV look phenomenal as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude13

customer_reviews.title: Clear and crisp
customer_reviews.text: Manuals online, read before judgement. requires simple setting of hdmi to allow hdr, this should be default to on but picture is unreal with dolby vison
customer_reviews.author: Kman

customer_reviews.title: Outdated and unsupported TVs are better
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our outdated and unsupported Panasonic Vera 60” with this tv. Ironically the unsupported and outdated tv looks better and is more reliable. Updates in software through Visio result in dysfunctional apps and random power downs. Updates in software result in resetting all application account data and disconnection of Apple airplay. Over all we are very disappointed. In this case it may be better to buy un-American. Sad...but true; and yes I know the components are made overseas. Still I had hoped for better QA and software support.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Probst

customer_reviews.title: Not waht I expected from Vizio
customer_reviews.text: This tv replaced a Vizio 3D tv. The 3D tv had a more crisp view and could be seen from an angle. This M-series fails in that regard. You have to be sitting directly in front of the TV for a decent view. Fortunately I bought this on sale and dont have alot of $ invested in it. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MBNNC

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture but blah everything else
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great picture but the software (ie the smart interface) has horrific response times (ie it lags for 10 seconds from when you hit a button and something happens). It constantly drops streams despite being right next to the router and apps are very, very slow. Bought this so I wouldn’t need a roku anymore but am prob going to have to use it again cause the interface is just so laggy. Remote is also awful haha - completely unintuitive, having a bunch of useless buttons and missing normal ones
customer_reviews.author: cnew

customer_reviews.title: Love this TV! By by Samsung everything
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing TV! Visio is one of the better brands. Don’t dial into to the itty bitty details. Great quality well worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: FreeDrinks

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Vizio TVs in the past and had no problems. Not so with this tv. Five months after buying it the screen started having flashing lines across it and would randomly power off while on. Vizio only has a warranty on its product for 90s so you are screwed out of nearly $1k if you have problems a day after. Online forums show that many customers have this same problem with these TVs and, in fact, Consumer Reports no longer recommends this brand due to the problems and customer service the company provides. I have never been so sad about a purchase from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vixio 55" Quantum
customer_reviews.text: It has a good picture if you look directly at it. Side view not good. And the sound is terrible. And no adjustments make it any better.
customer_reviews.author: RMR

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived broken in the box. If you receive one open the box carefully and don’t throw away packaging material until you confirm that it’s functional.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Loving TV for football & movies
customer_reviews.text: This is our third Vizio TV and the biggest screen to date (65”). Set up was easy and when hooked up to our 7.1 sounds system the 4K streamed movie experience (firestick 4K) is like being in our own private theatre. For cord cutters this TV is great because it comes with Pluto that offers lots of free content. Also, it has airplay built in so we can send video from the iPad or iPhone. Loving this TV so far for football games and movies.
customer_reviews.author: Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy worst tv ever
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a minute since over left a review of a product. But this tv is the worst-my 10+ year old Samsung tv functioned better than this one. It randomly will not connect to the internet and flat out stop working until it’s restarted. Just stopped working all together after 2 weeks-will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible experience with Amazon and Vizio + Update
customer_reviews.text: New TV delivered 7 days late, kept turning on by itself, Amazon said I could return it for the sale price and replace at the full price WTF?, Vizio tech support finally sent a repair person, still turning on by itself, Vizio will only send a refurbished one, came home early for delivery only to find the order was cancelled!!! 43 days later, I have to unplug it at night and when I leave home. UPDATE: Vizio states they now realize it is a software problem and will have a new release “sometime” in the future.
customer_reviews.author: mypov

customer_reviews.title: very good pic, like the reviewers said.  and very nice price too.  the Smart aspect is great
customer_reviews.text: home tv, works fine..setup was a bit involved, and it has an inconsistent time getting the audio hdmi handshake with my yamaha amp...but that may be the amp. still working on it. i would def buy again...but hope i don't have to for a loooong time.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv!
customer_reviews.text: This TV was easy to set up, it took about 10 minutes to set up everything......I got rid of my cable because of the free channels well over 140 channels......Many apps to choose from, the color is great. Clear and beautiful.....I will recommend this TV to all my friends......GREAT TV!!!!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Smartcast is awful
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the picture quality. OS is awful. Smartcast has been basically unusable for me. I expected it to be bad based on reviews and the price but it's so much worse than I thought it would be. The menu gets stuck on a grey screen requiring a factory reset. Some apps get stuck on a black screen until they decide to work. Even if it worked correctly the smartcast menu is painfully slow. Thought I could handle the slow buggy OS when I bought it but I guess I'm getting a USB stick. Still, on sale this is a great tv for the price, even if you have to buy a USB stick separately.
customer_reviews.author: David Hamm

customer_reviews.title: Home doesnt always load
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV after watching some reviews. I am not totally unhappy with but the home screen doesn't always load. Sometimes i have to go to 2 or 3 different apps with hitting home in between to make the home screen load. Other than that it is a good tv with great picture for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: Hitachi is far BETTER!!! $200 less
customer_reviews.text: I've had or VIZEO for the past 20 years. This one....Turned On in middle in the middle night constantly. Would not work efficientity with my cable. Difficult to hear Sound Comes rom the back. Very frustrated! Sent it back. Bought a Hitachi Roku smart TV. WONDERFUL, very happy! Does all I want it to do, sound, connection to cable, AND $200 less at Sam's Club!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We have several Vizio televisions and have not had a problem with them, so we decided to go with Vizio. This TV set up so easily and has everything we wanted: great picture, fits on our console, has good sound, and the best price for a great Smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: naner0331

customer_reviews.title: No so great
customer_reviews.text: The problem is in the speaker that's in the back of the TV. It's hard to hear and you have to turn it up to 45-50 to hear some channels. Also it takes forever to turn on. You have to push the button two or three times before it turn the TV on.
customer_reviews.author: JMLRBustamante

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV with a major issue...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice TV with a decent picture. However, this TV has a serious issue of turning on by itself and has not been addressed yet with a software update. I read about this complaint often and you would think Vizio would want to fix this problem. Do yourself a favor and pass on this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV to replace an older VIZIO 3D TV. Despite the hiccup with delivery, product arrived on time and handled with care. Was easy to mount to my existing tv stand. Only thing I haven't tried yet is playing my PS4 in Ultra HD, as I need to purchase a better HDMI cable. But overall, love the TV, and love the upgraded VizioCast.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Vega

customer_reviews.title: RCA/component Input doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The RCA component input doesn’t work. I haven’t needed to use it until now and purchased it just under 6 months ago. The remote control also doesn’t work well and hasn’t since the beginning. As some of the reviews stated the sound isn’t very good on the tv which is true. The sound bar I bought isn’t all that great either but helps a little.
customer_reviews.author: Dava Jump

customer_reviews.title: Value for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a seriously great TV for the price (under 650) on sale. I was almost about to spent double on a Sony. Which would be a little better but not $750 better. Am very happy so far. Gaming is totally fine. If you are a super picky gamer why buy this? I haven’t figured out how to airplay to this yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Airplay and Chrome Cast dont work
customer_reviews.text: I've used this Tv for 4 months now and have never been able to use its smart features in all this time. I've contacted support multiple times and their best instruction was to turn it off and on. The user interface is mediocre. I've previously owned Samsung Smart Tvs and had a more enjoyable streamlined experience. There is a noticeable lag when using the remote on any and all of the apps. The only good thing this Tv has is its image quality. If you buy this Tv, just know you should also buy a separate streaming stick or device to make up for the gap.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas T Bustelo

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Really like tv but it had been dropped and has a 3 inch dent on the bottom and it turns on by itself constantly! Have to remove batteries from the remote! Anytime I have to restate WiFi the smarttv won’t work unless I rest the whole tv to factory! Anyone else have this issue?
customer_reviews.author: Jefffrey Joe Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Requires a bit of tuning of picture but great quality. The remote is a little lacking compared to that of an LG remote but so far, very streamlined UI. Not the greatest features but easily remedied through a smart device such as Apple TV 4K, Roku Ultra or Nvidia Shield.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: I use it for gaming and streaming and could not be happier with the image quality. The only downside is the operating system that luckily I had a Apple TV so I use it only as a display for my console and Apple TV. Also it supports home kit so you can do some actions with it
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Soares

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!!!!Vizio
customer_reviews.text: Great product ... comes with free channels that aren't live all the time but still essential .... great quality picture sound is a 4 out of 5 but overall the tv quality is just too good ...... 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: Mr F

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: If I had done my homework properly, I would have bought this TV first. Jumping from a 50" to a 55" made ALL THE DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD. The blacks in this TV are far superior to its smaller cousin. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Primetime

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: The tv is amazing when it actually works.. I ordered the tv off Amazon in may and I’ve probably had to restart the tv 3 times a day because it freezes up and disconnects from my home WiFi. Paying this much for a tv I can’t even use half the time is just devastating. For this amount of money you can purchase a better television that’ll actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Nick dimperio

customer_reviews.title: Tv
customer_reviews.text: Good purches but feel that the tv picture quality is weird on the eyes sometimes...hard to explain, maybe I'm just getting old. But I love the free tv and movies and apps it has on it. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L.

customer_reviews.title: TV turns on by itself
customer_reviews.text: Above average TV except it has been turning o n by itself, this is very annoying, may have to send back. Anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: TJM

customer_reviews.title: Good picture but has issues.
customer_reviews.text: This tv had all the issues that everyone talks about. Randomly powered on and off, would freeze and lag on apps and changing inputs. When it worked it was a great picture, but It had too many issues to risk keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Futch

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: The smart part of this is what we bought it for, but the picture quality is what keeps us amazed. Great detail! It's easy to navigate using the Smart features, and that's a real bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Not as dependable as the older version
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older version, my first issue was a little one; my wall mount from the old one did not fit this one the spacing on back of tv is different. No biggie. However about a week later I started noticing volumn would randomly go up for a second on its own. One day I woke up to the tv on couldn't figure it out, now it randomly turns itself off and on all on its own. Today turned it on and no sound, after unplugging it and turning it back on I have sound again. I'll be contacting Vizio now I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Seller doesn’t replace damaged items for the same cost
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited to get our new TV however when it came the box was damaged on both sides with large gashes ( I have pictures). When we opened it everything appeared ok but when we turned it on, in the exact spot of one of the gashes the screen was severely damaged. So we boxed it back up for a return and product replacement. It didn’t allow for replacement and when we tried to buy again it was twice as much!!! Really that’s not cool! We want the same TV for the same price but not damaged!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Can’t believe I had to even give one star most upset as a customer I’ve ever been for anything
customer_reviews.text: I’m appalled I bought this tv for almost $600 screen blanks out and has huge lines going down it flashing red and other multiple colors. I either received a damaged tv or it was damaged in the truck just hoping I can get my money back considering how hard it is to deal with amazon shipping
customer_reviews.author: Gerri L Hurdle

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, but no surfing.
customer_reviews.text: great TV for the money. Picture is great, sound is great and the smart tv options are great, except it doesn't allow you to go to the internet directly. You can only use the features in the smart tv menu. So no surfing online. But other than that, it really is a good tv for the value.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure k made the best purchase here. The system is super slow. The casting has many issues. And for what is advertised as Android TV you can not install the apps you like or uninstall this up either. Not a bad TV but definitely not worth more then $300 at best. Other breand worn just like it with less money. I tried it but I will never by Vizio again.
customer_reviews.author: Raiko Exposito

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the deal
customer_reviews.text: Okay product for the price. Would not buy again. There are far too many glitches with the tv randomly turning on and the home screen not loading. Works fine if you just want to press the Netflix button and get to that app.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Zeller

customer_reviews.title: No Disney Plus
customer_reviews.text: This TV does not work with Disney Plus. Although the app shows on the TV it never loaded. I did troubleshoot it online and found there are Visio TV’s that Disney Plus doesn’t work on and this apparently is one of them although there was no mention of this before I made the purchase. If there was a zero, that’s what I would have chosen.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: The new TV arrived at my door and within 15 minutes, it was up and running. What a great picture as compared to my old TV. I love that it has the smart features.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip R. Semenick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picture, random automatic turn on after left off.
customer_reviews.text: First off, bought this TV while on sale. Overall great TV, picture is amazing, built in speakers are average (I bought a sound bar at the same time so it does not impact my thoughts), however the TV does have one quirk... on a handful of occasions in the last 5 months of owning, the TV has turned on by itself. I’ve been fiddling around with the settings and have not found a solid fix (since the symptom is so infrequent I cannot tell if it is gone).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Roach

customer_reviews.title: Major Power Issues - Do Your Research
customer_reviews.text: The tv looks excellent... when it stays on. I’ve come across and issue where I’ll be watching a movie or show, and the tv will just shut off entirely. It turns itself back on after a few seconds, but does this easily 3x a day. A vizio repairman came to fix it, and while it stays on now, it takes about 5 minutes between turning it on and picture actually being displayed on my screen. Very dissatisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: MRIreland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these open box specials from Amazon. The picture is vibrant and clear. Refresh rate is good. Great for watching football. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This one lives up to it's advertising as much as any TV I have used in a long time. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: My 3rd Vizio . Really nice picture . Downside to this model is limited apps . Simple fix is a Roku stick , $45 . More choices now than we can ever watch .
customer_reviews.author: ricodba

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this October 30, 2019 it is constantly turning off by itself and starting smart cast and now today the color change you see in the picture the left half is a different color then the right side of the screen!
customer_reviews.author: beth broderick

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this tv for about 3 months. I bought two. And they both decide to work when they want. So. Cool. Glad I spent $1200 on two TVs that lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Screen goes blank and will not come on.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tv however my home screen went blank! I was excited to see they have YouTube TV on the home page, one of my favorite apps. I’m returning this TV as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best TV i have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: First 4k SMART TV ever. Im glad i chose this one... very good quality picture with a sleek design. Fast shipping from amazon as always and i would highly recommend this product. to install the legs just push them in.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy that I did a lot of research before purchasing. I wanted excellent quality in color and clarity and have it with this tv.
customer_reviews.author: M. Peterson

product_meta.title: VIZIO M558-G1 M-Series Quantum 55” 4K HDR Smart TV
product_meta.description: Style:55” 4K HDR Smart TVExperience a world of extraordinary color with the all new VIZIO M Series Quantum 55” Class (54. 5” diag.) 4K HDR Smart TV. The first in class to utilize cutting edge Quantum Dot technology, the award winning M Series Quantum delivers cinematic color intensity with up to 80 percent more color than standard 4K TVs. Featuring VIZIO’s Smart Cast 3. 0, streaming, controlling, and sharing your favorites has never been easier. Built on a powerful Active Full Array backlight, VIZIO’s next generation Quantum Color technology produces over a billion shades of colors to create vivid images with hyper realistic details and textures in Dolby Vision HDR. Ultra Bright 600 delivers bright, detailed highlights at up to 600 nits of brightness, more accurately reproducing the nuances in every picture. And 90 local dimming zones enables deep black levels with stunning depth and contrast, resulting in picture quality that must be seen to be believed. VIZIO’s Smart Cast 3. 0 is the one stop smart TV solution that brings you more of the entertainment you love, thanks to Apple Airplay 2 support and Chromecast Built in. With Apple Airplay, use your iPhone, iPad or Mac to stream movies, shows, music, and photos from iTunes, Apple TV and other Airplay compatible apps to the TV. Browse favorites like Netflix and Hulu right on the TV or enjoy free and unlimited TV from over 150 channels with VIZIO Watch Free. Streaming, controlling, and sharing has never been easier — no extra streaming devices or remotes needed. And every M Series Quantum makes a great smart home companion, with voice control support for Siri, Google Assistant, and Alexa. Power on your TV, stream apps, and much more with simple hands free voice control. With a breathtaking picture and brilliant streaming solutions — the M Series Quantum is the perfect entertainment centerpiece for any home. Color defined as the color volume measured using Dolby’s MDC (millions of distinguishable colors) specification that factors the range of colors and luminance levels; standard 4K HDR TV features rec709 color, up to 300 nits of brightness and no local dimming.
feature_bullets: Extraordinary color experience: VIZIO quantum color technology produces up to 80% more color than a standard 4K HDR TV
Brighter pictures, more detail: Ultra bright 600 delivers up to 3x brighter imagery with striking detail in every highlight
Deep shades of black: Our powerful Active Full Array backlight features 90 local dimming zones allowing for deep black levels with stunning depth and contrast
Dolby vision HDR: Capable of displaying a wider spectrum of colors & detail; Includes HDR10 and HLG content support
Hands-free voice control: Supports Alexa, Google Assistant and Apple Home kit
Mirroring freedom: Stream movies, TV shows, music and more or mirror your screen for presentations and video chats directly on your TV using Apple AirPlay or built-in Chromecast
What's in the box: Smart TV, TV stands, remote, batteries, stands screws, power cord

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars751 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
